name: Extra-Cheese Burger
description: Special veggie burger with Aallo Patty and a cheese slice. Vegetable cabbage, tomato and onion. Sauces: Mayonnaise, tomato.

name: Classic Chicken Wings
description: Wings are served with your choice of blue cheese, ranch, or lite ranch dressing on the side.

name: Meatball Sandwich
description: Three large classic meatballs with marinara sauce. Topped with mozzarella and parmesan on a toasted sour dough hoagie.

name: Coconut Chicken Fingers
description: Chicken tenders fried in a coconut coating with creole mustard mayo or plum sauce and a side of green lime beans.

name: Supreme Boneless Chicken Wings
description: Go boneless with easy to eat 100% breast meat. More chicken, less bone, lots of flavor.
